name: RM2k3 - Rogue
description:
Prototype of a Roguelite mix with Pokemon under RPGMaker 2003, and EasyRPG.

Actually, there's only 4 differents Monsters to capture, and only 1 floor.

                                                                     

You're trapped in a dungeon where you can catch monsters. There are a huge variety of monsters throughout the dungeon, and your job is to find a way through using a team of up to three of them.

Each monster has a unique set of abilities that make it powerful in certain situations, so knowing how to use your monsters is key to success.

The more monsters you catch, the more powerful you become. Eventually, you will be able to face the dungeon's final boss in an epic battle for your life.
